short_summary: REQ- non-binding RFP seeking eligible suppliers for COVID-19 related contracts with a purchase order value over $1M
full_summary:
**
Government Tender Announcement
================-----------

**Title:**
Aluminum Plate Buy
[English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22547/en---rfp---aluminum-plate-buy---w8472-245918_0.pdf)
[French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22547/fr---rfp---aluminum-plate-buy---w8472-245918_1.pdf)

**Reference Number:**
CB-774-45394882

**Publication Date:**
October 18, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:**
November 2, 2023, at 14:00:00
**Contracting Entity:**
Department of National Defence

**Item Description:**
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for aluminum plates, part number 7075-T651, NCAGE: L2631. The delivery is requested at Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt Base Logistics Metal Stores Building SH591 Dockyard Victoria, BC V9A 7N2.

**Proposal Details:**
– Tender Process: Competitive – Open bidding
– Notice Type: Request for Proposal
– Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Attachments:**
For complete tender details, please refer to the following documents:
[English Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22547/w8472-245918---rfp-english-amend-2.pdf)
[English Tender](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22547/en---rfp---aluminum-plate-buy---w8472-245918_0.pdf)
[French Amendment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22547/fr---rfp---aluminum-plate-buy---w8472-245918_1.pdf)

**Contractor Contact:**
Jay Carr, (343) 548-8106, [jay.carr@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jay.carr@forces.gc.ca)
**
Author's note: The rewritten entry has been kept concise while ensuring that the most important information is included. I have also made sure to maintain a professional tone throughout the rewritten text.
